name: The House Before
description:
You wake up as a house.

Your limbs stretch through endless rooms filled with grotesque creatures. You can never see outside of yourself, never feel the world that lies beyond the fleshy walls of your body.

You manage your insides as best as you can, but you wonder : are you a good house or just a pale afterthought of the House Before ?

-----------------

The House Before is a blend between a visual novel and an adventure game with some dungeon crawler and 3d platformer elements.

The game is mostly a narrative experience with light puzzles.

-----------------

Explore your guts.



Heal old wounds.



Be a good house.



Remember who you used to be.



Raise your children.



Procreate.



Be better than the House Before.
